name: KREIS
description:
Kreis is a fast game that tests your reflexes.

Avoiding the red figures each time gets more difficult the longer and more punctuation you get.

Get the highest possible score and share it with your friends. #kreis

Hold down the blue orb to move it with the mouse.

(if you play on the phone)

Do not stop holding the sphere or you will explode into a thousand bits (quite literally).

(if you play on computer)

The sphere will just follow your mouse automatically.

The red figures will make you explode.

The blue orbs are on screen for a short time but if you catch them you will explode all the red figures, thus giving you a little time.
